creator: dmh@dmh.org.uk
text:
Would it be possible to add the OpenOffice.org MIME types to the default 
installation?

application/vnd.sun.xml.writer	sxw
application/vnd.sun.xml.writer.template	stw
application/vnd.sun.xml.writer.global	sxg
application/vnd.sun.xml.calc	sxc
application/vnd.sun.xml.calc.template	stc
application/vnd.sun.xml.impress	sxi
application/vnd.sun.xml.impress.template	sti
application/vnd.sun.xml.draw	sxd
application/vnd.sun.xml.draw.template	std
application/vnd.sun.xml.math	sxm

creator: slive@apache.org
text:
I believe our policy is to add mime types only after they are registered with the 
IANA.  These ones are not registered yet.  Please let us know when they are
registered.  Thanks.
